translation: That firm man, whom surely these afflictions do not, O chief among men, to whom pleasure and pain are the same, is fit for attaining immortality.
commentary: 2.15 Yam whom? Hi surely? do not hurt afflict not? These these? The man man? bull chief among men? samadukkhasukham same in pleasure and pain? Dhiram firm man? He he? for immortality for immortality? kalpate is fit.Commentary -- Dehadhyasa or identification of the Self with the body is the cause of pleasure and pain.
